mapper.update:
update p_room
romame = #{romame,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
romddress = #{romddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
romnumber = #{romnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stemindatetime = #{stemindatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endmaxdatetime = #{endmaxdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
romstate = #{romstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romphone = #{romphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
romurgent = #{romurgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
romidentitynumber = #{romidentitynumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rommany = #{rommany,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romdeposit = #{romdeposit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romPaymentmethod = #{rompaymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
romkong = #{romkong,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romintkong = #{romintkong,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romwater = #{romwater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romelectric = #{romelectric,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romgasl = #{romgasl,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romweizhi = #{romweizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenzhangdai = #{tenzhangdai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tenshouk = #{tenshouk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rommianji = #{rommianji,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romhuxing = #{romhuxing,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romflg = #{romflg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
romnfn = #{romnfn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where romid = #{romid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into p_room (romid, romame, romddress, romnumber, stemindatetime, endmaxdatetime, romstate, romphone, romurgent, romidentitynumber, rommany, romdeposit, romPaymentmethod, romkong, romintkong, romwater, romelectric, romgasl, romweizhi, tenzhangdai, tenshouk, rommianji, romhuxing, romflg, romnfn) values (#{romid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{romddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{romnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stemindatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endmaxdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{romstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{romurgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{romidentitynumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rommany,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romdeposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rompaymentmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{romkong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romintkong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romwater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romelectric,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romgasl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romweizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenzhangdai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tenshouk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rommianji,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romhuxing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romflg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{romnfn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
